name: Maze Ball! - 3d classic balance ball game
name_original: Maze Ball! - 3d classic balance ball game
description:
Maze Ball is an innovative balance ball rolling adventure for iOS devices, packed with plenty of platforming action and physics-based puzzles!

Dynamic and varied gameplay mechanics are complemented by stunning visuals for a blissful and engaging mobile experience.

Easy and fun to play, challenging to master.

Take on this alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Maze Ball is completely free to play and you can play with no wifi and you can unlock full game features when connected to the Internet.

Features:
- 60 original levels and more will be added regularly.
- Wide variety of puzzles, traps and obstacles.
- Free coins every day.
- Simple yet precise tilt controls.
- 3D stunning graphics, real-time physics simulation.
- Compete with all players in the world on the leaderboard of each level.
- Varieties of balls with different lookings and physics to choose.
- Build-in game record system for reply or share exprience with others.

Have fun playing Maze Roller.
